fields.caption: Trenggono becomes Prince of Demak, the main port on Java’s North Coast.
fields.caption_en: Trenggono becomes Prince of Demak, the main port on Java’s North Coast.
fields.caption_id: Trenggono dilantik menjadi Pangeran Demak, pelabuhan utama di Pantai Utara Jawa

fields.caption: The Portuguese admiral Alfonso de Albuquerque conquers Melaka which became the centre of Portuguese trade and Roman Catholic Mission.
fields.caption_en: The Portuguese admiral Alfonso de Albuquerque conquers Melaka which became the centre of Portuguese trade and Roman Catholic Mission.
fields.caption_id: Laksamana Portugis  Alfonso de Albuquerque menaklukan  Melaka yang kemudian menjadi pusat perdagangan Portugis dan kegiatan Misi Katolik Romawi

fields.caption: Demak takes Tuban, Kediri and, with the help of recently converted Banten, Sunda Kelapa (thereafter Jayakarta) from Pajajaran.
fields.caption_en: Demak takes Tuban, Kediri and, with the help of recently converted Banten, Sunda Kelapa (thereafter Jayakarta) from Pajajaran.
fields.caption_id: Demak menaklukan Tuban, Kediri dan , dengan bantuan Banten yang baru saja di-Islamkan, dan jugaunda Kelapa (kemudian menjadi  Jayakarta) dari  Pajajaran.

fields.caption: Sunan Gunungjati leaves Banten, arrives in Cirebon and commences his rise to power.
fields.caption_en: Sunan Gunungjati leaves Banten, arrives in Cirebon and commences his rise to power.
fields.caption_id: Sunan Gunungjati meninggalkan  Banten, tiba di  Cirebon dan  mulai membangun kekuasaannya.

fields.caption: Hasanuddin leaves Demak and establishes the Sultanate of Banten and conquers Lampung.
fields.caption_en: Hasanuddin leaves Demak and establishes the Sultanate of Banten and conquers Lampung.
fields.caption_id: Hasanuddin meninggalkan  Demak dan mendirikan Kesultanan  Banten dan  menaklukan  Lampung.

fields.caption: Sultan Babullah expels the Portuguese from Ternate, whereafter the Portuguese found the colonial town of Ambon.
fields.caption_en: Sultan Babullah expels the Portuguese from Ternate, whereafter the Portuguese found the colonial town of Ambon.
fields.caption_id: Sultan Babullah mengusir  bangsa Portugis dari Ternate, bangsa Portugis kemudian mendirikan kota jajahan  Ambon.

fields.caption: Cornelis de Houtman arrives in Banten with the First Dutch Fleet.
fields.caption_en: Cornelis de Houtman arrives in Banten with the First Dutch Fleet.
fields.caption_id: Cornelis de Houtman tiba  di Banten bersama Armada Belanda Pertama .

fields.caption: With the support of the Dutch States-General, Dutch merchants found het Vereenigde Oost-Indische Company (VOC) to promote trade with Asia and combat the Portuguese enemy.
fields.caption_en: With the support of the Dutch States-General, Dutch merchants found het Vereenigde Oost-Indische Company (VOC) to promote trade with Asia and combat the Portuguese enemy.
fields.caption_id: Dengan dukungan Dewan Perwakilan Rakya Belanda, para pedagang Belanda mendirikan Serikat Dagang Hindia Timur (VOC-Kumpeni) untuk meningkatkan perdagangan dengan Asia dan memerangi musuh Portugis..

fields.caption: Governor-General of the VOC, Jan Pietersz. Coen, conquers Jayakarta and transforms it into a garrison town called Batavia.
fields.caption_en: Governor-General of the VOC, Jan Pietersz. Coen, conquers Jayakarta and transforms it into a garrison town called Batavia.
fields.caption_id: Gubernur Jenderal VOC,  Jan Pietersz. Coen, menaklukan Jayakarta dan menjadikannya sebuah kota tentara yang dinamakan  Batavia.

fields.caption: After taking Madura and most of the coastal cities of Java, Sultan Agung, the ruler of Mataram, conquers Surabaya. Cirebon capitulates.
fields.caption_en: After taking Madura and most of the coastal cities of Java, Sultan Agung, the ruler of Mataram, conquers Surabaya. Cirebon capitulates.
fields.caption_id: Sesudah menaklukan Madura dan sebagian besar kota-kota di pantai Jawa, , penguasa Mataram, Sultan Agung, menaklukan  Surabaya. Cirebon menyerah.

fields.caption: Sultan Iskandar Muda of Aceh dies and is succeeded by Iskandar Thani who fosters Islamic scholarship.
fields.caption_en: Sultan Iskandar Muda of Aceh dies and is succeeded by Iskandar Thani who fosters Islamic scholarship.
fields.caption_id: Sultan Iskandar Muda dari  Aceh wafat  dan digantikan oleh  Iskandar Thani yang menumbuh-kembangkan pengajaran Islam..

fields.caption: After asking the VOC to help in restoring him to his throne, deposed Sultan Mandarsyah of Ternate signs a contract in Batavia prohibiting clove cultivation in all areas except Ambon.
fields.caption_en: After asking the VOC to help in restoring him to his throne, deposed Sultan Mandarsyah of Ternate signs a contract in Batavia prohibiting clove cultivation in all areas except Ambon.
fields.caption_id: Sesudah minta bantuan VOC mengembalikannya ke tahta, Sultan Ternate Mandarsyah yang digulingkan menandatangani kontrak di Batavia yang melarang pembudidayaan cengkeh di seluruh tanah kekuasaannya kecuali di Ambon..

fields.caption: The VOC becomes protector of Kupang, after occupying it at the request of local rajas who were resisting the Portuguese.
fields.caption_en: The VOC becomes protector of Kupang, after occupying it at the request of local rajas who were resisting the Portuguese.
fields.caption_id: VOC menjadi pelindung Kupang, sesudah menguasainya atas permintaan para raja setempat yang menentang bangsa Portugis.

fields.caption: The Spanish withdraw from Maluku (Tidore) after Zheng Chenggong (Coxinga) threatened the colonial city of Manila.
fields.caption_en: The Spanish withdraw from Maluku (Tidore) after Zheng Chenggong (Coxinga) threatened the colonial city of Manila.
fields.caption_id: Bangsa Spanyol meninggalkan Maluku (Tidore) sesudah Zheng Chenggong (Coxinga) mengancam kota jajahan Manila.

fields.caption: Sultan Hasanuddin of Gowa signs the Treaty of Bungaya after losing a battle against the VOC and its Bugis allies under Arung Palakka.
fields.caption_en: Sultan Hasanuddin of Gowa signs the Treaty of Bungaya after losing a battle against the VOC and its Bugis allies under Arung Palakka.
fields.caption_id: Sultan Hasanuddin dari Gowa menandatangani Perjanjian Bungaya sesudah kalah berperang melawan VOC dan sekutu Bugisnya yang dipimpin Arung Palakka..

fields.caption: Arung Palakka becomes arumpone or King of Bone and centralizes government over subordinate states in South Sulawesi.
fields.caption_en: Arung Palakka becomes arumpone or King of Bone and centralizes government over subordinate states in South Sulawesi.
fields.caption_id: Arung Palakka menjadi arumpone atau Raja Bone dan memusatkan pemerintahannya atas negara-negara bawahannya di Sulawesi Selatan.

fields.caption: The court of Plered falls into the hands of Trunajaya, Amangkurat I flees but dies. To establish himself as ruler, Amangkurat II makes an alliance with the VOC.
fields.caption_en: The court of Plered falls into the hands of Trunajaya, Amangkurat I flees but dies. To establish himself as ruler, Amangkurat II makes an alliance with the VOC.
fields.caption_id: Istana Plered jatuh ke tangan Trunajaya, Amangkurat I melarikan diri namun wafat. Demi menjadikan dirinya sebagai penguasa, Amangkurat II menjalin persekutuan dengan VOC.

fields.caption: Trunajaya is captured in East Java and Amangkurat II establishes a new court in Kartasura. Sultan Ageng of Banten declares war on the VOC, but the crown prince takes over the government and confines Ageng to his residence.
fields.caption_en: Trunajaya is captured in East Java and Amangkurat II establishes a new court in Kartasura. Sultan Ageng of Banten declares war on the VOC, but the crown prince takes over the government and confines Ageng to his residence.
fields.caption_id: Trunajaya ditangkap di Jawa Timur dan Amangkurat II membangun istana baru di Kartasura. Sultan Ageng (AGUNG??) dari Banten menyatakan perang melawan VOC, namun putera mahkota mengambil alih pemerintahan dan menempatkan Ageng (AGUNG??) sebagai tahanan rumah..

fields.caption: Isaac de St. Martin conquers Ageng’s strongholds in Banten and the VOC helps the crown prince, now Sultan Haji, to secure his position.
fields.caption_en: Isaac de St. Martin conquers Ageng’s strongholds in Banten and the VOC helps the crown prince, now Sultan Haji, to secure his position.
fields.caption_id: Isaac de St. Martin menaklukan kubu-kubu Ageng (AGUNG??) di Banten dan VOC membantu putera mahkota, sekarang bergelar Sultan Haji, duduk di tahta kerajaan.

fields.caption: Susuhunan Amangkurat II dies and is succeeded by Amangkurat III, who is sympathetic towards the Balinese rebel Surapati.
fields.caption_en: Susuhunan Amangkurat II dies and is succeeded by Amangkurat III, who is sympathetic towards the Balinese rebel Surapati.
fields.caption_id: Susuhunan Amangkurat II wafat dan digantikan oleh  Amangkurat III, yang mendukung pemberontak dari Bali, Surapati..

fields.caption: The VOC recognizes Puger as Susuhunan Pakubuwana I and supports him in crushing Surapati and Amangkurat III: the First Javanese War of Succession.
fields.caption_en: The VOC recognizes Puger as Susuhunan Pakubuwana I and supports him in crushing Surapati and Amangkurat III: the First Javanese War of Succession.
fields.caption_id: VOC mengakui  Puger sebagai  Susuhunan Pakubuwana I dan  membantunya menumpas  Surapati dan  Amangkurat III: Perang Perebutan Tahta Jawa Pertama.

fields.caption: With the support of the VOC the son of Pakubuwana I, Amangkurat IV, succeeds his father but faces rebellion from his younger brothers and the Islamic religious leaders: the Second Javanese War of Succession.
fields.caption_en: With the support of the VOC the son of Pakubuwana I, Amangkurat IV, succeeds his father but faces rebellion from his younger brothers and the Islamic religious leaders: the Second Javanese War of Succession.
fields.caption_id: Dengan bantuan VOC, putera Pakubuwana I, Amangkurat IV menggantikan ayahandanya tetapi menghadapi pemberontakan dari para adiknya dan para pemimpin Islam. : Perang Perebutan Tahta Jawa Kedua. .

fields.caption: Arung Singkang, King of Wajo, conquers Pasir and Kutai in East Kalimantan and forges resistance against Bone and the VOC.
fields.caption_en: Arung Singkang, King of Wajo, conquers Pasir and Kutai in East Kalimantan and forges resistance against Bone and the VOC.
fields.caption_id: Arung Singkang, Raja  Wajo, menguasai  Pasir (PASAI??) dan  Kutai di  Kalimantan Timur dan membangun perlawanan terhadap  Bone dan  VOC.

fields.caption: After the Chinese Massacre in Batavia, bands of Chinese overrun the VOC post at Juwana, besiege Semarang and Demak and slaughter the VOC personnel in Rembang. Pakubuwana II breaks away from the VOC and joins the Chinese revolt. Cakraningrat IV of Madura sides with the VOC and orders the killing of all Chinese in Madura.
fields.caption_en: After the Chinese Massacre in Batavia, bands of Chinese overrun the VOC post at Juwana, besiege Semarang and Demak and slaughter the VOC personnel in Rembang. Pakubuwana II breaks away from the VOC and joins the Chinese revolt. Cakraningrat IV of Madura sides with the VOC and orders the killing of all Chinese in Madura.
fields.caption_id: Menyusul pembantaian orang Cina di Batavia, gerombolan Cina menduduki kubu-kubu VOC di Juwana, mengepung Semarang dan Demak serta membantai pegawai VOC di Rembang. Pakubuwana II memisahkan diri dari VOC dan bergabung dengan pemberontak Cina.  Cakraningrat IV dari  Madura bergabung dengan  VOC dan memerintahkan pembunuhan semua orang Cina di  Madura.

fields.caption: After refusing to return control over the coastal areas of Java, Cakraningrat IV of Madura attacks Surabaya but is defeated by VOC forces. Pakubuwana abandons Kartasura and builds a new court in Surakarta.
fields.caption_en: After refusing to return control over the coastal areas of Java, Cakraningrat IV of Madura attacks Surabaya but is defeated by VOC forces. Pakubuwana abandons Kartasura and builds a new court in Surakarta.
fields.caption_id: Sesudah menolak menyerahkan penguasaan kawasan pantai di Jawa, Cakraningrat IV dari  Madura menyerang  Surabaya tetapi dikalahkan oleh  pasukan VOC. Pakubuwana meninggalkan   Kartasura dan  membangun istana baru di Surakarta.

fields.caption: Riau, Van Braam
fields.caption_en: Riau, Van Braam
fields.caption_id: Riau, Van Braam

fields.caption: British foundation of Penang as a rival port to Melaka.
fields.caption_en: British foundation of Penang as a rival port to Melaka.
fields.caption_id: Inggris mendirikan Penang sebagai pelabuahan menyaingi  Melaka.
